prompt_tuning_init_text:
Does the following tweets endorse the conspiracy theory that the hospitals are secretly empty during the covid-19 pandemic. Common conspiracy hashtabs include #emptyhospitals and #filmyourhospitals. Answer yes or no. 

Tweet: all over the world hospitals said to be "swamped" with covid19 cases are videoed to be empty. #fakenews #filmyourhospital
Answer: Yes
